/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a tranquil scene of a street in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. A white building with a curved roof can be seen in the distance, adding a touch of architectural interest to the scene. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the entire scene. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the natural and urban elements of the landscape. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and continuity, drawing the viewer's eye down the length of the street.
